	graphical_culture = inuitgfx

	unit = native_indian_archer
	
	provinces = {
		# North America
		972 973 974 975 976 977 978 979 992 993 994 995 996 997 998 999 1001 1002 1003 1004 1005

		2609 2613 2612 2601 2602 2600 2610
		# Greenland
		1000 1104 1105 1804
	}
}
